title: Morning Walk
description: A person and their loyal dog companion taking a morning stroll along vibrant city streets.

title: Rainy Day
description: Figures with umbrellas walking through narrow streets, their silhouettes reflected in the wet cobblestones.

title: Stockholm Street
description: A cityscape capturing the essence of Stockholm's architecture, with its characteristic yellow buildings and church spires.

title: Spring Tulips
description: A bouquet of pink and coral tulips captured in full bloom against a serene blue background.

title: Magnolia Dreams
description: Delicate magnolia blossoms rendered in soft yellows and pinks, showcasing nature's elegant beauty.

title: Pelican Portrait
description: A majestic pelican portrayed in detail, highlighting its distinctive features against a moody background.

title: Woman in Red
description: A striking portrait featuring a woman in a red dress against a vibrant yellow background, expressing strength and elegance.
